train_extractive module¶

Main training workflow

class train_extractive.ErrorHandler(error_queue)¶

Bases: object

A class that listens for exceptions in children processes and propagates the tracebacks to the parent process.

add_child(pid)¶

error handler

error_listener()¶

error listener

signal_handler(signalnum, stackframe)¶

signal handler

train_extractive.run(args, device_id, error_queue)¶

Run process

Args:
device_id: gpu device if available error_queue: error traceback
train_extractive.test_ext(args, device_id, pt, step)¶

Evaludate model on testing set based on loaded checkpoints and training steps

Args:
device_id: gpu device if available pt: saved checkpoints step: training steps

Spawns 1 process per GPU
